description: Refined finishes and a streamlined design means that the Men’s Summit Series Casaval Hoodie looks just as great off the mountain as it does on your next summit expedition. With breathable, synthetic Ventrix™ insulation throughout the body, hood, and sleeves, this mid layer provides lightweight, breathable warmth in key areas.
name: The North Face Summit Casaval Hoodie - Mens

specs.value: 40 gVentrix™ 80% recycled polyester, 20% polyester stretch synthetic insulation
25 g Ventrix™ 59% polyester, 41% recycled polyester stretch synthetic insulation
